summary: The file defines a NodePropertyFlow class that encapsulates the MODFLOW-6 Node Property Flow (NPF) package, handling hydraulic conductivity tensors, cell type flags, rewetting behavior, conductance calculations, and optional output settings for groundwater flow simulations.
business_intent: The purpose of this file is to provide a structured interface for defining, validating, and applying NPF parameters, enabling modelers to accurately represent anisotropic hydraulic properties, wetting/drying dynamics, and generate desired flow-related outputs in MODFLOW-6 simulations.
